| Resource     | List                                                        |
|--------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|
| decoder:file | 0005-wazuh_decoders.xml 0064-cisco-asa_decoders.xml         |
|              | 0100-fortigate_decoders.xml 0160-netscaler_decoders.xml ... |

| Actions       | Resources    | Allow                                               | Deny |
|---------------|--------------|-----------------------------------------------------|------|
| decoders:read | decoder:file | 0005-wazuh_decoders.xml 0160-netscaler_decoders.xml |      |
